lead_paragraph: INTERNATIONAL A3-11 Taliban Movement Smashes Afghan Treasures The Islamic Taliban government ignored international pleas and began demolishing all statues across Afghanistan, including two ancient stone Buddhas, in a strict interpretation of Islamic law banning idols by the movement's leader. A9 Putin Does Business in Vietnam The Russian president, Vladimir V. Putin, on his first official visit to Vietnam, signed a ''strategic partnership'' with President Tran Duc Luong and won for Russia the exploration rights to a 38-square-mile tract of oil-rich continental shelf in the South China Sea.
